content: Create shared TypeScript types for booking system entities (Instructor, Client, Booking, etc.)
Build AI-powered instructor matching system with skill, style, language, and personality compatibility
Implement advanced booking features (multi-day packages, group bookings, waitlist management, rescheduling)
Create dynamic pricing system with peak time adjustments, group discounts, and demand modeling
Implement booking optimization with conflict detection, overbooking prevention, and real-time updates
Build customer experience features (progress tracking, confirmations, guides, follow-ups)
Create backend API with Express.js, database models, and business logic
Build React frontend for booking interface and management dashboard
